modules.moduleTitle: Module 1: Introduction to Bus Captain Role

content.data: A Bus Captain is responsible for passenger safety, route navigation, and providing excellent customer service.
Safety is the top priority for every Bus Captain. Understanding and implementing safety protocols is essential.

questions.text: What is the primary responsibility of a Bus Captain?
questions.hint: Think about what matters most to passengers.

questions.text: When should a Bus Captain perform vehicle inspection?

options.b: At the beginning of each shift
